library.description: Magic layout is a JQuery plugin by which you can animate all the elements on the page. There are 36 CSS3 animations that gives a huge advantage in performance. The plugin follow Responsive Web Design and it is fully adapted for mobile devices
library.name: Magic layout

library.description: GoldenLayout is a javascript layout manager that supports drag and drop arranging of components, popouts, serialisation and a wealth of other interactions. Itâ€™s completely configurable and comes with a comprehensive API to implement custom behaviours.
library.name: GoldenLayout

library.description: Masonry is a dynamic grid layout plugin for jQuery. Think of it as the flip-side of CSS floats. Whereas floating arranges elements horizontally then vertically, Masonry arranges elements vertically, positioning each element in the next open spot in the grid. The result minimizes vertical gaps between elements of varying height, just like a mason fitting stones in a wall.
library.name: Masonry
